text:
Liga
Valencia: Paulista "wants to play for Spain"
While he is from Brazil, Valencia defender Gabriel Paulista has announced he wants to play for the Spanish team.
06 Nov 2019, 14:41 by Hugo Deloraine



Yesterday, Valencia won against Lille 4-1, on the fourth day of the Champions League. In his ranks, the Valan√ßois could count on the presence of the experienced defender, Gabriel Paulista (29 years). After the match, the player from Sao Paulo, Brazil, expressed his desire to play with the Spanish team.




"If Brazil call me, I will not go"




Paulista with Osimhen + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"I want to be part of the Spanish team, I think I have done a good job and I hope to continue in this way so that I can be called in. If Brazil calls me, I will not go" Not sure, Anyway, the Brazilian coach, Titus, really want to call after such a statement.
